title: How to Know if a Leo Woman Likes You

steps.title: To a Leo, holding a crush’s full attention is super exciting and meaningful.
steps.content: To a Leo, holding a crush’s full attention is super exciting and meaningful. When she’s the center of your focus, she feels like she’s being appreciated by you. [2] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. This makes her feel connected. So naturally, when a Leo likes you, she’ll fight hard for you to notice her. [3] X Research source If she locks you into conversation with a long, dramatic story or joke, take note. This could be her way of maintaining your focus. If she vies for your attention, that's a great sign.

steps.title: A Leo knows how funny she is, and she’ll want her crush to know, too.
steps.content: A Leo knows how funny she is, and she’ll want her crush to know, too. If you've got her affections, she'll be determined to dazzle you. [4] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. As a natural people person and performer, not only will she be interested in making you laugh, but she’ll be darn good at it. [5] X Research source Think back, do you feel like you’re always caught in side-splitting laughter around her? If so, this is a sign that she likes you. On the other hand, if you feel like she doesn’t bring out her best material in conversation with you, that hints that she’s not interested.

steps.title: Leos consider their own time and attention to be precious resources.
steps.content: Leos consider their own time and attention to be precious resources. Whether it's for a dance, a joke, or a dramatic story, the Leos you know are wanted by everyone all the time. You can assume that others want her attention and that she’ll want to give it. When a Leo chooses to step away from her audience and give the floor to you, this is a huge gesture. On the other hand, if you feel like you can never get her alone in a crowd, this might be a sign that she sees you more as a friend.

steps.title: A Leo will have her crush’s name on her lips as often as possible.
steps.content: A Leo will have her crush’s name on her lips as often as possible. She has a personal brand to maintain and a spotlight she doesn’t love to share. So when a Leo decides to direct attention towards you, it’s a big deal! Even if it’s an embarrassing story about that time you tripped into the swimming pool, to her, she’s sending an important message: “This person is exciting and worth your attention.” Plus, when a Leo is willing to publicly associate herself with you, she’s giving you her seal of approval. Does the Leo in your life love bringing you up to other people? If so, there’s a good chance she has a crush.

steps.title: Leos women are bold, so she won't be afraid to stare if she likes your look.
steps.content: Leos women are bold, so she won't be afraid to stare if she likes your look. She won’t see any point in pretending not to glance at you if that’s exactly what she’s doing. Instead, she might freely throw long, lingering looks when she likes you. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. If you catch her in the act, she may even choose to shoot you a big smile! [7] X Research source If you feel like you constantly spot her checking you out, that's a good sign. On the other hand, if you can never seem to catch her eye when the two of you are out and about, this may signal that she’s not interested.

steps.title: A Leo prioritizes her appearance, and if she likes you, she'll want you to see that.
steps.content: A Leo prioritizes her appearance, and if she likes you, she'll want you to see that. To a Leo, self-love means donning the best, glam clothes and bold looks. If she likes you, she’ll step this effort up around you. She’ll want you to see her at her best and ultimately, think of her as an all-around, exciting person. [8] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. This means exciting to look at, too! If you find yourself thinking that she looks absolutely amazing every time you see her, this is a sign that she's interested . If she doesn’t seem to whip out her favorite fits for your meetups, that could hint that she sees you more as a friend.

steps.title: If a Leo likes you, she'll want everyone on the planet to see you two together.
steps.content: If a Leo likes you, she'll want everyone on the planet to see you two together. A Leo will think highly of you if you have her heart. She’ll want the people she cares about to see all of your fabulous qualities, too. And of course, to her, attention and audiences are super important. So if she tries to draw other's eyes onto you, this means she thinks you’re worth their praise! [9] X Research source If the Leo lady in your life makes rounds with you at every party you attend, this indicates that she likes you If she seems a bit less keen to introduce you around, this may mean she’s interested more so as a friend.

steps.title: A Leo’s personal brand is sacred to her, so if she posts you, that's significant.
steps.content: A Leo’s personal brand is sacred to her, so if she posts you, that's significant. When a Leo shares photo after photo of you to her loyal followers, you can definitely read into that behavior. In her mind, this means you’re on her level—and that’s huge! Is she quick to include a photo of you in every Insta post? This could certainly signal her interest.

steps.title: When a Leo is crushing on you, she'll randomly visit and call.
steps.content: When a Leo is crushing on you, she'll randomly visit and call. One of the coolest aspects of the Leo personality is how they can follow their hearts without fear of rejection. If a Leo likes you, she won't be afraid to try and see you. When she wants to hear your voice, she’ll dial you right up. [10] X Research source If you get unexpected calls and visits from a Leo woman, this means she loves to interact with you. This says that she's emotionally invested in you, too!

steps.title: If a Leo likes you, she'll love to share with you.
steps.content: If a Leo likes you, she'll love to share with you. Leos might be the most generous sign in the zodiac, so if she likes you, there will be little gifts galore. [11] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Whether it be her dessert or her phone charger, she’s likely to take a what’s-mine-is-yours approach with the person she cares about. If she offers you treats, gifts, or trinkets, that suggests that she's into you.

steps.title: When a Leo cares about you, her loyalty will be a given.
steps.content: When a Leo cares about you, her loyalty will be a given. If you know she would drop anything and come to your rescue if you needed her help, that’s huge. However, she definitely treats both friends and romantic partners with this same protectiveness. So consider this behavior a sign that you’ve got her heart, but don’t assume from this alone that it’s romantic. If a Leo woman comes to your aid when you’re sick, you’ve been wronged, or you’ve gotten into trouble, then she cares a lot about you.

steps.title: If a Leo woman goes to you when she needs support, then she likes you.
steps.content: If a Leo woman goes to you when she needs support , then she likes you. She has no shortage of loyal companions to help her when she needs it. So, if you’re the person she chooses to trust with her problems, that means that she thinks you’re special. [12] X Research source Consider whether or not she’s ever gone to you in the past when she had a bad day, got hurt, or was struggling with her emotions. If she has, this is a sign that she likes you.

steps.title: If a Leo likes you, she won't want to share you with anyone.
steps.content: If a Leo likes you, she won't want to share you with anyone. She’s too confident, combative, and fiery to let anyone make a move on you without consequence. As one of the three fire signs, a Leo’s fearlessness and energy make her a pretty intimidating person to compete against for your affection. If she likes you and knows there are other interested parties, she’ll definitely want to do something about it. If you know that the Leo in your life is trying to keep other romantic interests away, then it’s super likely that she likes you.

steps.title: When a Leo likes you, she'll want to brighten your day.
steps.content: When a Leo likes you, she'll want to brighten your day. It’s that simple! If she looks for ways to support you, excite you, and bring joy into your life, then that Leo probably likes you. [13] X Research source Does she try to make you laugh on your bad days and show up on the days you need a friendly face? If a Leo woman always seems to be looking out for you, this suggests that she likes you.

steps.title: If a Leo woman likes you, she’ll probably just come right out and say so.
steps.content: If a Leo woman likes you, she’ll probably just come right out and say so. She’s confident, direct, and self-aware, so women of this sign aren’t likely to spend too much time waiting around for you to make the first move. She’d be more likely to walk right up and say something like, “Hey, I like you. Is that feeling mutual?” If a Leo tells you she likes you, trust that she’s being honest and not playing any games. If a Leo hasn’t explicitly told you how she feels, it’s less likely that she’s interested, but still definitely possible. Look out for other signs that she's interested.
